title: Salesforce Einstein Product Offerings
description: Discover Salesforce Einstein's AI-powered tools that enhance productivity, decision-making, and customer experience across various Salesforce clouds.

products.name: Einstein Lead Scoring
products.description: Prioritize leads by predicting their likelihood to convert based on AI analysis of historical data.
features: Smart insights into lead attributes that impact conversion.

products.name: Einstein Opportunity Scoring
products.description: Get AI-generated scores for opportunities to focus on deals most likely to close.

products.name: Einstein Activity Capture
products.description: Automatically log emails and events to Salesforce and analyze sales activity trends.

products.name: Einstein Bots
products.description: Automate routine service requests and deliver instant responses with intelligent chatbots.
features: Integration with customer data for personalized responses.

products.name: Einstein Case Classification
products.description: Automate case triaging by using AI to classify and route cases to the right agents.

products.name: Einstein Case Wrap-Up
products.description: Speed up case resolution by providing AI-powered case summaries.
features: Reduce agent effort on repetitive tasks.

products.name: Einstein Engagement Scoring
products.description: Use AI to predict customer engagement and tailor campaigns for better outcomes.
features: Engagement predictions for emails, push, and SMS.

products.name: Einstein Content Tagging
products.description: Automatically tag content with AI-driven labels for better search and management.

products.name: Einstein Send Time Optimization
products.description: Identify the best time to send marketing messages for maximum engagement.

products.name: Einstein Product Recommendations
products.description: Provide personalized product recommendations to boost sales.
features: Dynamic recommendations based on user behavior.

products.name: Einstein Commerce Insights
products.description: Leverage AI to analyze shopping behavior and optimize product assortments.

products.name: Einstein Discovery
products.description: Get AI-powered insights, predictions, and recommendations to drive smarter decisions.

products.name: Einstein Predictions
products.description: Create custom predictive models using Salesforce data.

products.name: Einstein Voice Assistant
products.description: Use voice commands to interact with Salesforce and get work done faster.
features: Create tasks, update records, and access reports via voice.

products.name: Einstein Search
products.description: Search Salesforce smarter with AI-enhanced search capabilities.
